inclusion.criterion: At least 3 cycles of primary systemic treatment have been given
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No standard axillary lymph node dissection is performed prior to chemotherapy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: cT3-T4 invasive breast cancer prior to any treatment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with > 3 suspicious axillary nodes on imaging
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: More than focally irradical surgery and breast conserving therapy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer, HER2-positive and ER/PR negative.
